Base:Descriptions.Base:Description:
This massive portrait spans a huge pine nine feet high and five feet across. The background shows an opulent room, with a large window looking out over a lush forest vista. Within the room hang many fine draperies, depicting widespread and exotic patterns from all the corners of the continent. With one muscular arm resting on an intricate fireplace, engraved with detailed motifs of The Hunt, stands the noble wolf that occupies the focus of the painting. The decadent and exuberant furnishings appear minimal with the powerful presence of the wolf. Full sleek black hair adorns his head swept back in a dashing style, at his temples distinguished silver streaks are noticeable, framing his imperious profile. Sharp pure gold eyes set beneath bushy grey eyebrows follow you about the room, artfully mimicking his powerful gaze. beneath his aquiline nose his firm mouth and full lips are set in a stern expression. He is covered in dense black fur, that does little to hide his predatory bearing. He is dressed in full battle armour, the helmet held under his left arm is clearly of remarkable quality, and it shows on it the occasional scratch and dent of war. The silver inlaid dark metalbreastplate depicts a windmill in great detail. Around his waist he wears a black and red tartan kilt, held by a leather belt with an intricate buckle, tucked into this belt are two pistols one of ebony and silver, the other of redwood and gold,both match -lock pistols of technical design, from behind his back you see the muzzle of a musket. He large, leather booted feet stand on a red and gold carpet, with a strange design, if you were to tilt your head to the right you would see that it repeats the message "Sang 889".
This sketch is of outstanding quality.
A nine foot by five foot portrait of an imposing noble wolf.

Core:Properties.Core:Property: " A nine foot by five foot portrait of an imposing noble wolf."
